Package clientSide.stubs

Class TableStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.TableStub
  • public class TableStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the table. It instantiates a remote reference to the table. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
    Author:
    Martim Neves, Tiago Dias

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TableStub​(java.lang.String hostName, int port)
      Stub instantiation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableStub

        public TableStub​(java.lang.String hostName,
                 int port)
        Stub instantiation.
        Parameters:
        hostName - name of the platform where the table server is located.
        port - number of server listening port.

    • Method Detail

      • getThePad

        public void getThePad()
        Waiter gets the pad and waits for the student to describe the order. Waiter notifies the student that he has the pad.

      • deliverPortion

        public void deliverPortion()
        Waits while there's no one to be served. When a student is waiting to be served the waiter serves and notifies him.

      • haveAllClientsBeenServed

        public boolean haveAllClientsBeenServed()
        Checks if all the clients have been served.
        Returns:
        if all the clients have been served.

      • presentTheBill

        public void presentTheBill()
        Waiter presents the bill and waits for the student to pay. Waiter notifies the student that the bill is ready.

      • informCompanion

        public void informCompanion()
        Student informs companion of his course choice. Notifies the companion that he has chosen.

      • prepareTheOrder

        public void prepareTheOrder()
        Increases the number of requests received by the first student.

      • joinTheTalk

        public void joinTheTalk()
        Student chats with his companions.

      • hasEverbodyFinished

        public void hasEverbodyFinished()
        Waits for everybody to finished eating.

      • startEating

        public void startEating()
        Students wait until everyone is served and then start eating.

      • endEating

        public void endEating()
        Students finish eating.

      • honourTheBill

        public void honourTheBill()
        Student waits until the bill is ready and then pays it. Notifies the waiter that the bill is payed.

      • addUpOnesChoice

        public void addUpOnesChoice()
        Student waits to be informed by his companions and increases the number of requests received by the first student.

      • hasEverybodyChosen

        public boolean hasEverybodyChosen()
        Checks if everybody has chosen.
        Returns:
        if everybody has chosen.

      • describeTheOrder

        public void describeTheOrder()
        Student calls the waiter when everyone has chosen and waits for the waiter to get the pad. Notifies the waiter that the order has been described.

      • waitingToBeServed

        public void waitingToBeServed​(int sID)
        Student blocks while not served by waiter
        Parameters:
        sID - student id

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Operation server shutdown. New operation.
